DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine topical vasodilating cream improve female sexual experience .
DOC.brief_title: The Impact Topical Vasodilating Cream Female Sexual Experience
DOC.detailed_description: To determine placebo control double blind study whether topically apply vasodilating cream improve female sexual response measure standard female sexual dysfunction questionnaire
DOC.criteria: Healthy female age 25 sixty sexually active Neurologic disease , SSRI 's , advanced diabetes , non sexually active , mentally incompetent
